title: Summertime (Arrange ver.)
lyrics: Kimi no toriko ni natte shimae ba kitto kono natsu wa jujitsu suru no mot to mou modore nakutatte wa surenaide demo ki mochi wo tsu taete shimaeba itsuka kono yume wa samete shimau darou na aoi kage ga yure ru machikato nan nen tatte mo ienai kouhai shitatte ka mawanai demo kotoba wa kokoma de deteruno nee, sama-taimu kaigan-tori wo arukitai do raibu datte shite mitai tada shisen wo awasete hoshii no nee, sama-taimu yoake made umibe wa hashit te shiosai ni tsutsumaretai ne kano jo no shigusa ga amai ne Kimi no toriko ni natte shimae ba kitto kono natsu wa jujitsu suru no motto mou modore nakutatte wa surenai de demo kimochi wo tsu taete shimaeba itsuka kono yume wa samete shimau darou na aoi kage ga yure ru machika to
